article: Today Grandma comes for a visit . She gives my sister and me a box of chocolate candies . We say " thank you ! " Then Jenny quickly takes off the box . The pieces all look the same ! I ca n ' t tell which pieces are hard inside and which are soft ! I only like the soft ones . Jenny does not care . She is happy to get any kind of candy ! I slowly look at all the pieces ; I do n ' t know which one to choose . Just then Dad calls us Grandma is going home , He wants us to say goodbye to her . I hurry to the front door where they are standing . Jenny comes a few minutes later . I say , " Grandma , I hope to see you soon . I always feel sad when you leave . " Jenny stands behind me and does n ' t say anything . After Grandma goes home , I find out why Jenny does n ' t say anything . She has most of our candies in her mouth ! Only a few pieces are left in the bottom of the box ! Then I ' m sad !
questions: Why does n ' t Jenny say anything when her grandma leaves ? Because

model: she does n ' t want to tell her grandma
her mouth is full of chocolate candies
human: she does n ' t want to say goodbye to her grandma
her mouth is full of chocolate candies
